name: places/ChIJgW9cdCpawokR9N7AtwgVBL0
formattedAddress: 405 Grand St, New York, NY 10002, USA
adrFormatAddress: 405 Grand St, New York, NY 10002-3951, USA

originalText.text:
HORRIBLE service. I dropped my Uggs off here to be cleaned some weeks ago. They were hardly worn so I initially only brought one boot in because of a little coffee stain. The owner advised that I bring both since they might appear a little lighter after they’re cleaned. Fine.

Well, the fur lining of my boots were completely destroyed and now look like an old and heavily worn cheap pair of boots. Not only that, they punctured safety pins with tags inside of the suede, leaving permanent holes in each boot. I showed the owner and he rudely told me the shoes aren’t even that expensive and people can buy them for $100 now. I respectfully asked for a refund and he immediately said “no.” He was unapologetic and disrespectful.

Regardless of the price of someone’s belongings, they brought it to the cleaners with the intention of having their items cleaned and treated with care. Telling someone their clothing/shoes aren’t even that expensive to lessen their reasoning for being upset about an item being ruined is a HORRIBLE way to treat anyone, yet alone a paying customer.

I will NEVER return here again and strongly advise anyone to go elsewhere in the neighborhood.

originalText.text: I've been to Special Touch Valet Cleaners three times because they are close my apartment. The owner is just mean. Also, he always says it will be ready the next day and it is never available the next day. When you ask when it will be ready, he gets really angry and yells, "IT'S COVID! YOU HAVE TO BE PATIENT!" But like... I wasn't yelling. He was? And if he had just told me the next day, that would have been fine too. I think I will walk the extra couple blocks to find a better dry cleaner from now on.

originalText.text:
Horrible service. Complained that my buttons were getting smashed. Instead of assuring me that they will take care of my clothing, he dismissed my concerns and "gave" me the options of paying 5 bucks more to have it iron by hand.  A few more off handed remarks about my clothing, and I had to walk out the door to seek better options.

I am glad he has other regular consumers, he just lost one here. I am going to start using flycleaners.

originalText.text: As a regular patron of Special Touch Valet Cleaners, I was surprised to be treated in a disrespectful and inappropriate manner by the owner. His brusque attitude and shabby treatment were disgraceful. While I've  experienced good service in the past, I can no longer patronize this establishment.

originalText.text: Friendly reasonably priced and good service. They do all work on premises so clothes come out fresh.

text.text: Friendly reasonably priced and good service. They do all work on premises so clothes come out fresh.
